item.title: Let's Talk About Extreme Value Theory
item.description: Let’s talk about Extreme value theory - Wikipedia and information risk. I won’t throw down a bunch of R, because it’d basically just be a re-hash of the first reference listed below. Instead, I’ll share my current thinking on where EVT might fit. It fits when you’re interested in examining the end of the tail. When you might have a handful of extreme, low probability observations and you want to fit a distribution to those observations to help estimate a true maximum or for some reason think about just how extreme something might get.
